Overview  Package  Class   Use  Tree  Deprecated  Index  Help 
X-Hive/DB 7.0.0
 PREV   NEXT FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Uses of Package
com.xhive.core.interfaces

Packages that use com.xhive.core.interfaces
com.xhive Contains XhiveDriverFactory, used as the basis for creating sessions. 
com.xhive.core.interfaces This package contains the X-Hive core interfaces, that give access to database (meta-)information, database users and authorities, and control the connection to the database (including transaction control). 
com.xhive.dom.interfaces This package contains the library interfaces (for collections of documents) and X-Hive specific extensions to the W3C DOM Interfaces, as well as interfaces related to special DOM related data. 
com.xhive.dom.xlink.interfaces This package contains W3C XLink convenience classes: (1) a utility class with basic link-resolution, link-expansion and link-management functions (2) a DOM XLink API where users can retrieve XLink information from DOM nodes. 
com.xhive.federationset.interfaces This package contains interfaces for federation sets. 
com.xhive.index.interfaces This package contains the interfaces for the indexes and index list. 
com.xhive.query.interfaces This package contains the X-Hive query interfaces. 
com.xhive.versioning.interfaces This package contains the X-Hive versioning interfaces. 
com.xhive.xpath.interfaces This package holds XPath specific interfaces, a number of which are now deprecated. 
 

Classes in com.xhive.core.interfaces used by com.xhive
XhiveDriverIf
           The X-Hive/DB driver provides factory methods for different functionalities of X-Hive/DB.
XhiveFederationFactoryIf
          Contains methods to create and restore federations.
 

Classes in com.xhive.core.interfaces used by com.xhive.core.interfaces
XhiveAuthorityIf
          Controls permissions on user objects.
XhiveDatabaseIf
           Represents an X-Hive/DB database.
XhiveDriverIf
           The X-Hive/DB driver provides factory methods for different functionalities of X-Hive/DB.
XhiveDriverIf.XhiveDriverObserverIf
          An interface that can be implemented by application code to be notified of events in the X-Hive/DB subsystem.
XhiveFederationFactoryIf.PathMapper
          An interface that can be implemented to restore federations to directories different from the original location.
XhiveFederationIf
          The federation object manages the collection of X-Hive/DB databases, and is only accessible by the super user.
XhiveFileIf
          Represents a physical storage location used by the database.
XhiveGroupIf
          A XhiveGroupIf represents a collection of XhiveUserIf objects.
XhiveGroupListIf
          Collects XhiveGroupIf objects in a list.
XhiveLockingContextIf
           This interface is implemented by objects that represent a locking context, and enables users to lock such an object explicitly.
XhivePageCacheIf
          This interface represents a cache of pages that can be used by federations.
XhiveSegmentIf
           A segment is a logical storage location in an X-Hive database.
XhiveSessionIf
           Represents an extended interaction between an application and the connected database.
XhiveSessionIf.TimeStamp
          An interface to be used with XhiveSessionIf.getUpdateTimeStamp() and XhiveSessionIf.waitForTimeStamp(com.xhive.core.interfaces.XhiveSessionIf.TimeStamp).
XhiveUserIf
           Represents an X-Hive/DB User.
XhiveUserListIf
          Collects XhiveUserIf objects in a list.
 

Classes in com.xhive.core.interfaces used by com.xhive.dom.interfaces
XhiveAuthorityIf
          Controls permissions on user objects.
XhiveDatabaseIf
           Represents an X-Hive/DB database.
XhiveGrammarPoolIf
          X-Hive/DB uses Xerces Java 2 to parse and validate documents with XML Schema.
XhiveLockingContextIf
           This interface is implemented by objects that represent a locking context, and enables users to lock such an object explicitly.
 

Classes in com.xhive.core.interfaces used by com.xhive.dom.xlink.interfaces
XhiveLockingContextIf
           This interface is implemented by objects that represent a locking context, and enables users to lock such an object explicitly.

Classes in com.xhive.core.interfaces used by com.xhive.index.interfaces
XhiveLockingContextIf
           This interface is implemented by objects that represent a locking context, and enables users to lock such an object explicitly.
XhiveNamedItemIf
          An XhiveNamedItem is an object that has the following properties: Name Description Creation date Modification date Named items are owned by a user.
XhiveNodeIteratorIf
          Iterator for a list of XhiveNodeIf objects.
 

Classes in com.xhive.core.interfaces used by com.xhive.query.interfaces

          Iterator for a list of XhiveLocationIf objects.
